GSD36pars1__u:3: Par1.57cd/ sarve te narakaṃ yānti kāka.yoniṃ vrajanti ca //
GSD36pars1__u:4: Par1.58ab/ pāpo vā yadi caṇḍālo vipraghnaḥ pitṛg.ghātakaḥ /
GSD36pars1__u:5: Par1.58cd/ vaiśvadeve tu samprāptaḥ so;atithiḥ svarga.saṃkramaḥ //
GSD36pars1__u:6: Par1.59ab/ yo veṣṭita.śirā bhuṅkte yo bhuṅkte dakṣiṇā.mukhaḥ /
GSD36pars1__u:7: Par1.59cd/ vāma.pāde karaṃ nyasya tad vai rakṣāṃsi bhuñjate //
GSD36pars1__u:10: Par12.14cd/.pitaras.tarpitās.tena.rudhireṇa.malena.ca.// (BI:tarpitās tena te sarve rudhireṇa malena ca //
